Congratulations on your new phone!

To ensure optimal wireless charging, follow these tips to place your Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra correctly on the charging pad:

1. **Center the phone**: Place the phone in the center of the charging pad to ensure the charging coils align properly. This will help maximize the charging speed and efficiency.
2. **Align the charging coils**: The Galaxy S22 Ultra has a charging coil located at the back of the phone, near the bottom. Try to align this coil with the center of the charging pad's coil (usually marked with a logo or a ring). This will help improve the charging performance.
3. **Remove any obstructions**: Make sure there are no objects, such as credit cards, keys, or other metal items, between the phone and the charging pad, as they can interfere with the charging process.
4. **Position the phone flat**: Place the phone flat on the charging pad, with the screen facing up. Avoid placing it at an angle, as this can reduce the charging efficiency.
5. **Check the case compatibility**: Since you've got a case on your phone, ensure it's compatible with wireless charging. Some cases may have metal or other materials that can interfere with wireless charging. If you're unsure, try removing the case to see if it makes a difference.
6. **Adjust the phone's position**: If you're not getting a good charging connection, try adjusting the phone's position slightly on the charging pad. You might need to move it a few millimeters to find the sweet spot.
7. **Monitor the charging indicator**: Keep an eye on your phone's charging indicator to ensure it's charging correctly. If it's not charging, try repositioning the phone or checking for any software updates.

By following these tips, you should be able to get the best wireless charging experience with your new Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra and charging pad. Enjoy your new phone!
